title: Where to buy lunar revel pass
body: I cannot find the area or website to buy the lunar revel 2019 pass. I want it but all I see Is token in the shop. how am I supposed to get tokens or even the pass if it s expensive in the shop and cannot be found? I Bought the 10 token 10 master chest thing hoping it was what the pass really is. nope. cant find it..      :/

replies.body: Sorry D23, the Lunar Revel event has concluded so the pass is no longer available for purchase. The [Learn More article](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/learn-more-lunar-revel-2019) stated that it would run from January 28, 2019 to March 4, 2019.
Will there be any other passes this year to Catch up? I want the Ahri Prestige Skin

You can buy the Prestige Ahri Skin with 100 Prestige Points. You can receive Prestige Points through buying the Masterwork Chest Bundles in the Store which specifies that you will receive 1 or 13 Prestige Points (depending on the bundle) per purchase of the bundle or through Special Event content that appears through the year, usually during the holiday season or League-specific events.

You can view how many Prestige Points you have and craft the Prestige Ahri Skin in Hextech Crafting.
